snippet: Representative Jay Kim, Republican of California, today pleaded guilty to accepting illegal campaign contributions, including $50,000 from a Taiwanese businessman.    Mr. Kim, 58, pleaded guilty to three counts of accepting illegal contributions t...
lead_paragraph: Representative Jay Kim, Republican of California, today pleaded guilty to accepting illegal campaign contributions, including $50,000 from a Taiwanese businessman. Mr. Kim, 58, pleaded guilty to three counts of accepting illegal contributions totaling $145,000 from 1992, when he was first elected to Congress, to 1996, when he won his third term.
abstract: US Repr Jay Kim, Republican from California, pleads guilty to accepting illegal campaign contributions, including $50,000 from Taiwanese businessman (S)

headline.main: Lawmaker Pleads Guilty To Illegal Contributions
